About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm during school term; closed through school holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for original records to A3, maps and plans.

About.Access: Minimum age 12 years. One week's advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required. Records not normally available for research can be gained by authorisation from the Teacher - Librarian.

About.Acquisition focus: To preserve as many school records as space permits.

About.Major holdings: Hay War Memorial High School: Records 1923- (15m).
